title: Textile, ca. 1950
inscribed: attached label. " LAMPAS. Silk warp, silk and cotton filling. Draperies used for foyer, entrance hall and stairway to Grand Ballroom, Waldorf Astoria Hotel."
dimensions:
Warp x Weft: 157 x 64 cm (5 ft. 1 13/16 in. x 25 3/16 in.)
Repeat H: 80 cm (31 1/2 in.)
creditline: Gift of Mrs. R. Curt Hasenclever
description: Ribbons and tassels forming diamond shapes containing a bunch of flowers in green and beige on a rose background. Grommets for mounting as in a showroom sample at top and bottom.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, ca. 1950.
ca. 1950. Medum: silk, cotton
Technique: woven. Gift of Mrs. R. Curt Hasenclever. 1979-9-12.
